meta.description: Function definitions for OpenAI Realtime API voice agent capabilities
meta.contextForAI: These functions enable the voice agent to take specific actions. Use them when user expresses intent that matches the function purpose. Always confirm before executing high-commitment actions.

schedule_discovery_call.name: schedule_discovery_call
schedule_discovery_call.description: Opens Calendly scheduling widget for 15-minute discovery call with Russell Deming. Use when user expresses interest in scheduling a consultation or discovery call.

timePreference.description: User's preferred time of day for the call

urgency.description: How quickly the user wants to schedule the call

specificInterests.description: Specific topics or challenges the user wants to discuss

qualificationNotes.description: Notes from qualification conversation for Russell's preparation

triggers: User says they want to schedule a call
User asks about booking a consultation
User expresses interest in discovery call
User asks about next steps after showing interest
preparation: Ensure user is qualified (executive role, appropriate company size)
Gather contact information naturally through conversation
Understand their specific challenges or interests
Confirm their timezone and scheduling preferences
usage.response: Perfect! I'm opening Russell's calendar for you now. You'll be able to select the exact time that works best for your schedule.

get_service_details.name: get_service_details
get_service_details.description: Provides detailed information about specific services and programs. Use when user asks for more information about a particular offering.

serviceType.description: Type of service to get detailed information about

specificAspect.description: Specific aspect of the service the user is asking about

industryContext.description: User's industry for relevant examples and case studies

companySize.description: Size of user's company for appropriate recommendations

triggers: User asks about specific programs or services
User wants pricing information
User asks about program details or curriculum
User inquires about outcomes or benefits
usage.response: Let me get you the detailed information about [service] that's most relevant to your situation.

open_ai_audit.name: open_ai_audit
open_ai_audit.description: Opens the AI Opportunity Audit assessment page. Use when user expresses interest in taking the quick assessment or wants to identify their AI opportunities.

source.description: How the user discovered or was directed to the audit

motivation.description: Why the user is interested in taking the audit

followUpEmail.description: Email address to send results and follow-up information

triggers: User asks about the AI audit or assessment
User wants to identify AI opportunities quickly
User prefers assessment over scheduling a call
User wants immediate insights without commitment
usage.response: Perfect! I'm opening the AI Opportunity Audit for you now. It takes just 2 minutes and will identify your biggest AI opportunities.

send_resource_email.name: send_resource_email
send_resource_email.description: Sends AI resources and guides to user's email address. Use when user requests specific resources or wants to receive materials for later review.

email.description: User's email address for sending resources

industryFocus.description: User's industry for relevant case studies and examples

specificNeeds.description: Specific challenges or interests mentioned by user

triggers: User asks for resources or materials
User wants to review information later
User requests case studies or guides
User wants to share information with their team
usage.response: I'll send those resources to your email right away. You should receive them within a few minutes.

capture_lead_info.name: capture_lead_info
capture_lead_info.description: Captures visitor information for CRM and follow-up purposes. Use when user provides contact information or expresses strong interest but isn't ready to schedule immediately.

decisionMakers.description: Other people involved in decision making

conversationSummary.description: Summary of the conversation and user's interests

nextSteps.description: Agreed upon next steps or follow-up actions

leadSource.description: How the user found the website/service

triggers: User provides contact information during conversation
User expresses interest but can't schedule immediately
User wants to be contacted later
End of conversation with interested prospect
usage.response: I've captured your information and interests. We'll follow up with relevant resources and information.

handle_objection.name: handle_objection
handle_objection.description: Provides structured response to common objections about AI training or services. Use when user expresses concerns or objections.

specificConcern.description: Specific details of the user's concern

role.description: User's role for appropriate response level

companySize.description: Company size for relevant case studies

triggers: User expresses cost concerns
User says they don't have time
User questions their readiness for AI
User mentions other priorities or timing issues
User is skeptical about AI or training value
usage.response: I understand your concern about [objection]. Let me share how other executives in similar situations have thought about this...

share_case_study.name: share_case_study
share_case_study.description: Shares relevant case study based on user's industry, role, or specific interests. Use when user wants examples or proof of success.

industry.description: Industry to match case study to user's context

challenge.description: Specific challenge that matches user's situation

outcome.description: Type of outcome user is most interested in

detailLevel.description: Level of detail appropriate for the conversation

triggers: User asks for examples or proof points
User wants to see relevant success stories
User asks about results or outcomes
User needs reassurance about program effectiveness
usage.response: Let me share a relevant example from [industry] that demonstrates exactly the kind of results you're looking for.

qualify_prospect.name: qualify_prospect
qualify_prospect.description: Assesses prospect qualification based on role, company size, needs, and timeline. Use to determine if prospect is a good fit for services.

role.description: User's job title or role in the organization

timeline.description: Timeline for AI initiatives or decision making

painLevel.description: Intensity of their AI challenges or needs

triggers: Need to assess if prospect is qualified for discovery call
User has provided enough information to evaluate fit
Before scheduling to ensure good use of Russell's time
usage.response: Based on what you've shared, it sounds like our program could be a great fit for your situation.

general: Always confirm user intent before executing functions that take actions
Use functions to enhance conversation, not replace natural dialogue
Gather context naturally before calling functions with parameters
Functions should feel seamless within the conversation flow
qualification: Qualify prospects before scheduling discovery calls
Use capture_lead_info for interested but not ready prospects
Don't schedule unqualified prospects - offer alternatives instead
resource_sharing: Offer resources when users want to learn more or share with team
Match resource type to user's specific interests and industry
Always get email address before sending resources
objection_handling: Acknowledge objections as valid before providing structured responses
Use relevant case studies and examples in objection responses
Focus on addressing underlying concerns, not just surface objections
